Get a binary value from config, based on path

Source: R/misc.R
get_flag_from_config.Rd

Get a binary value from config, based on path

Usage

get_flag_from_config(
  flag = c("tools", "modelfit", "force"),
  default = FALSE,
  config = NULL
)

Arguments

flag

character vector indicating path to flag

default

default value for flag

config

list of config settings. If NULL will get it using get_luna_config()
